RE CFEEi left on your voice mailMy thoughts belowOn target Needs Work I am in Toronto so call Linda Wilson Possible Session Teaser CFEE How can we make room for and encourage new technologies The regulatory agencies need find innovative ways to uphold the federal and state clean air acts while at the same time not allowing offset or BACT requirements prevent emerging technologies from getting a chance to prove themselves and their promise of reductions beyond the current standards How can this be done
